SongName: You Got The Love (Deep Chills Remix)
Album: You Got The Love (Deep Chills Remix)
Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:46.57]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[00:47.54]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[00:52.35]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[00:56.93]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[01:01.32]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[01:05.52]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[01:10.21]
[01:27.08]Sometimes I feel like throwing my hands up in the air
[01:31.88]All I know, I can count on you
[01:35.60]Sometime I feel like saying "Lord, I just don't care. "
[01:40.00]But you've got the love I need to see me throught
[01:44.23]Sometimes it seems that the going is just too rough
[01:48.37]And things go wrong, no matter what I do
[01:52.75]Now and then, it seems like that life is just too much
[01:57.14]You've got the love I need to see me throught
[02:00.13]
[04:00.83]Every once in a while I say Lord I can't go on
[04:07.19]Every once in a while I get to feeling blue
[04:11.51]Every once in a while it seems like I am all alone
[04:15.87]you got the love I need to see me through
[04:15.87]Occasionally my thoughts are brave and friends are few
[04:20.13]Occasionally I cry out Lord what must I do
[04:24.25]Occasionally I call up Master make me new
[04:28.33]You've got the love I need to see me through
[04:32.59]When things go wrong, you are the name I call
[04:43.21]I just count on you 
[04:44.89]And when I'm alone I know your love won’t let me go
[06:31.00]
